synopsis.text: Leon, a mundane office worker, finds himself reincarnated into a ruthless otome game, where women hold the reins of power and only handsome men can assert themselves. Trapped in this unforgiving world, Leon harbors a powerful secret: he retains memories of his past life, including a complete walkthrough of the game he's now confined to. With a dream of a serene, rural life in mind, Leon embarks on a mission to revolutionize this oppressive world, navigating through complex relationships and challenging societal norms using his insider knowledge. Will Leon successfully transform this matriarchal game universe while striving for his idyllic countryside dream? Join him on this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
